text:
@SenSchumer @senatemajldr @SpeakerPelosi It's June 29th, and you Democrats are STILL holding COVID-19 relief hostage to advance your leftist agenda: Taxpayer funded abortion; Cash for non-citizens; No voter ID; Ballot harvesting? Your HEROES ACT SCAM is a SHAM. Just a leftist "opportunity" ...
https://t.co/aTSliXqvSl
